description:
"make test" fails with this error, if virtualenv is not available:
You need to install the Nova virtualenv before you can run this.

Please run tools/install_venv.py
make: *** [.nova-venv] Fejl 1


This breaks Ubuntu package buliding.
title: 'make test' requires virtualenv

comments.content:
"make test" fails with this error, if virtualenv is not available:
You need to install the Nova virtualenv before you can run this.

Please run tools/install_venv.py
make: *** [.nova-venv] Fejl 1
